Dear Cantera Users Group,

Could you explain if it is possible to set user =
defined rate
coefficients instead of the Arrhenius coefficients ?

If this =
option is not yet implemented - how difficult it would be to
implement it ?=


We have the (forward) rate coefficients for some steps in the reaction
me=
chanism calculated in a separate module and would like to use these
coeffic=
ients. (This module takes into account vibrationally excited
species).

Tha=
nk you, Robert.
